list_variables.description: A list of arbitrary attributes for this policy.
list_variables.name: Attributes

list_variables.description: A list of instance ports for the policy. These are the ports associated with the back-end                   server.
list_variables.name: InstancePorts

list_variables.description: A list of external load balancer ports for the policy.
list_variables.name: LoadBalancerPorts
list_variables.required: Only for some policies. For more information,                   see the Elastic Load Balancing                         Developer Guide.

variables.description: A name for this policy that is unique to the load balancer.
variables.name: PolicyName

variables.description: The name of the policy type for this policy. This must be one of the types reported by the Elastic Load Balancing                      DescribeLoadBalancerPolicyTypes action.
variables.name: PolicyType
